title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Where To Eat
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Where To Eat              Where To Eat         Pipe Spring NM Picnic Area NPS  The Kaibab Band of Paiute Indians operates a gas and convenience store 1/4 mile south of Pipe Spring. There is a small picnic area on the monument. Restaurants and groceries can be found in Fredonia, Arizona (15 miles east of Pipe Spring) and Kanab, Utah (25 miles northeast of Pipe Spring).
